detectors.description: OGCards._random(uint256,uint256) (contracts/OGCards.sol#317-321) uses a weak PRNG: r (contracts/OGCards.sol#320)

OGCards._random(uint256,uint256) (contracts/OGCards.sol#317-321) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: r = (uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.timestamp,msg.sender,_nonce,_salt)))) % _limit (contracts/OGCards.sol#318)
